SDKMan

Version and dependency manager for Java

Home - SDKMAN! the Software Development Kit Manager

SDKMan Requirements

unzip

zip

curl

sed

Installing SDKMan

 
sudo apt install unzip zip
curl -s "https://get.sdkman.io" | bash

Which Version of JDK Should I Use? | whichjdk.com

LTS Releases
note

EOL dates vary for each JDK distribution. For example, Oracle stopped commercial support for JDK 8 in 2022, while Azul will support it until the end of 2030.
